thread.title: Officially official: 49ers GM Baalke confirms he’s been fired
thread.title_full: Officially official: 49ers GM Baalke confirms he’s been fired

author: Eric Branch
title: Officially official: 49ers GM Baalke confirms he’s been fired
text:
Updated 2:08 pm, Sunday, January 1, 2017 
Trent Baalke has confirmed a very poorly kept secret: He’s been fired. 
The 49ers general manager acknowledged his dismissal on KNBR today before the kickoff against the Seahawks at Levi’s Stadium. 
“It didn’t surprise me,” Baalke said, via KNBR’s Kevin Jones. “We’ve done some awful good things. Some very successful seasons. Unfortunately, regret we weren’t able to bring a championship to the Bay Area, which they so deserve. I think The Faithful has been great. Wish this organization nothing but the best moving forward. I do see a bright future for them.” 
Baalke was told Friday that he’d been fired, but he said attending today’s game “was the right thing to do.” 
“This is a class organization,” Baalke said. “You know, I’ve been here since 2005 and I have a lot of respect for the organization as a whole, and the ownership, the fan base. It’s difficult, but it’s the right thing to do.” 
Baalke isn’t alone: Head coach Chip Kelly will reportedly be fired after today’s game. Photo: Marcio Jose Sanchez, Associated Press Image 1 of / 1
